mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM (SELECT rLevel, rTime, quantity, rImg, rName FROM RECIPE ORDER BY RCOUNT DESC) C WHERE ROWNUM >= #{number} AND ROWNUM <= #{number}+7 ORDER BY ROWNUM
SELECT ROWNUM, C.* FROM (SELECT rLevel, rTime, quantity, rImg, rName FROM RECIPE ORDER BY RCOUNT DESC) C WHERE ROWNUM >= 1 AND ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY ROWNUM
